feedback.author: schen
feedback.comment: I re-ran giving-api CI 3 times last week because of that stripe-mock thing. Total waste of time.

feedback.author: klee
feedback.comment: The volunteer-signup e2e test fails on basically every PR and it's never actually broken. We just re-run and pray.

feedback.author: agarcia
feedback.comment: Our integration tests take 8 minutes. That's 8 minutes of context-switching every push. I end up batching changes which makes reviews harder.

feedback.author: tpatel
feedback.comment: I don't understand why we run the full e2e suite on every PR. Most of my changes are CSS fixes.

feedback.author: mjohnson
feedback.comment: The receipt dedup test in donor-crm has failed on two of my PRs and I've never touched that code. Feels flaky.

feedback.author: rdavis
feedback.comment: I'd love to know which repos are burning the most CI minutes. Feels like we're paying for a lot of reruns.
